sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../pages/Home/Slideer/Slideer.css' import axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const SliderDetail = () => { const[slider,setSlider]=useState([]) const slider_arr=slider&&slider.map(item=>{ return item._id }) console.log(slider_arr); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/slider') .then(res => setSlider(res.data.sliders)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) return (
Add Slider {slider.map((sliders,_id)=>(
{sliders.description}

{sliders.title}

{ await axios.put(`http://localhost:5000/slider/${slider_arr[_id]}`) .then(res=>res.data) }}>UPDATE SLIDER
)) }
) } export default SliderDetail
